question: USD denominated Global Benchmark Bonds has been recently issued by which financial institution?
explanation:
The Manila headquartered Asian Development Bank (ADB) has issued USD denominated, 5-year Global Benchmark Bonds amounting USD 3 Billion.
The bonds bear a coupon rate of 0.375% per annum payable half yearly. These bonds would mature by September 2025. These ADB bonds have recorded 41 % placement in Asia, 34 % in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, and 25 % in America.
